entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:21 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
